author: amaltaro
body:
Most of this work has been done by Max Uetrecht (thanks!), including the porting of all our couchdb patches to CouchDB 3.1. A BIG thank you to Shahzad as well for the priceless supporting to build these specs.

A short summary of changes is:
* remove WMCore services dependency on `couchdb16`, instead define it to depend on `couchdb31`
* stop building `couchdb15` in the comp meta-package
* created new spec for CouchDB 3.1.2 version
* port replicator, ssl and cms-auth patches to CouchDB 3.1
* created new spec for Erlang 22.3.4.19
* port Erlang patches
* update WMAgent to `2.0.4.patch1` and make it depend on the new Couch version

More info at: https://git.phenomax.me/phenomax/cern-couchdbv3-rpm/-/blob/master/couchdb311.spec

Other references for Erlang and CouchDB 3.1 can be found at:
https://github.com/rabbitmq/erlang-rpm/blob/erlang-22.3.x/erlang.spec
https://github.com/adrienverge/copr-couchdb/blob/master/couchdb.spec

And of course, thank you very much for all the support and suggestions made by Shahzad!
title: New specs/version for Erlang and CouchDB 3.1.2
